channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 22:32 Alarm lifted in Uman district. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 22:32 Alarm lifted in Uman district. Follow further messages. #Uman_district This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 22:32 Alarm lifted in Cherkasy region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Uman district- Zvenyhorod district- Cherkasy district- Zolotonish district

item.title: 游댮 20:43 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Go to shelter!
item.description: 游댮 20:43 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Go to shelter! #Pokrovska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 20:30 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
